backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing entries with admin-restricted CRUD, publishing, and querying by section or search.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping requested features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH color variables and base styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root div and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router configuration including new Introduction route and admin-protected routes.
Component enforcing authentication and admin access, showing alerts when blocked.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/content/EntryLis: Displays a grid of entry cards with title, date, excerpt, and tags, linking to individual entry pages. Handles empty states and formats timestamps.
frontend/src/components/content/Prose.ts: Wrapper component applying consistent typography and styling to prose content. Accepts children and optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/feedback/QuerySt: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty-state messaging for data-fetching components. Renders appropriate UI based on query status flags.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with navigation links, copyright info, and a caffeine.ai attribution link. Computes current year and hostname dynamically.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the main site header with navigation, search, login, and mobile menu. Supports admin link visibility based on identity and authorization hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout component arranging header, main content, and footer. Ensures full-height page structure.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines centralized React Query keys for entries, search, auth, and works. Provides helpers for parameterized keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, initializing access control as needed. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminEntries.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting, and publishing entries via the backend actor. Invalidates relevant entry queries and displays toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminWorks.ts: Provides queries and mutations for managing works, including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and publishing. Handles sorting, cache invalidation, and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Queries whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor. Enabled only when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntries.ts: Fetches published entries by section and retrieves single entry details. Uses backend actor and sorts lists by creation time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearch.ts: Defines a search hook that queries entries by term and optional section, returning sorted results via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorks.ts: Adds hooks for fetching published works or a specific work using React Query and an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme color variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing the veridoxa platform and its mission.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard for managing entries across sections, including editing, publishing, and deleting.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditorPage: Form for creating or editing an entry, handling section, metadata, and submission logic.
Admin listing of all works with publish toggles, deletion, and navigation to upload or edit pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWorkUpload: Interface for uploading a new work file with progress tracking and metadata input.
frontend/src/pages/EntryDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single entry with title, date, tags, and formatted body, handling loading and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with section cards linking to research, storytelling, and poetry content.
frontend/src/pages/IntroductionPage.tsx: Static introduction page presenting the author's background and published works.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a searchable interface for entries with optional section filtering and result listing.
frontend/src/pages/SectionListPage.tsx: Displays entries for a specific section with optional tag filtering and list rendering.
frontend/src/pages/WorkDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single workâ€™s details, offering PDF viewing and download with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/WorksListPage.tsx: Lists published works with metadata and provides view or download actions depending on file type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, components, and enabled plugins for styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the site's goals, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the veridoxa build.
